COMBO.DESCRIPTION: When combo, card cost 1 less and deal 25% more damage; when combo finish, give dazed based on combo speed.

SPEED.DESCRIPTION: Combo give dazed amount = square root of (card played * 5000 / total speed amount).

SCRATCH.DESCRIPTION: Fastest, combo with grasp, scratch, feint and cut.

FEINT.DESCRIPTION: Fast, combo with grasp, scratch, feint ,cut, thrust and slash.

CUT.DESCRIPTION: Fast, combo with grasp, scratch, feint, cut and thrust; deal more damage when combo with cut.

THRUST.DESCRIPTION: Medium speed, combo with cut and thrust; combo deal more damage.

STRIKE.DESCRIPTION: Slow, combo with strike, chop, disarm, blow and hammer.

CHOP.DESCRIPTION: Very slow speed, combo with strike, chop, disarm, blow and hammer.

DISARM.DESCRIPTION: Slow speed, combo with chop, blow and hammer.

BLOW.DESCRIPTION: Extreme slow speed, combo with strike, chop, disarm, blow and hammer.

GRASPED.DESCRIPTION: Grasped creature lose 1 strength per stack this turn. Wear off when you play a card.

DISTRACTED.DESCRIPTION: Distracted creature deal 1% less and receive 1% more damage per stack this turn.

DAZED.DESCRIPTION: Dazed creature deal 1% less damage per stack. Reduces by half per turn. Stacks based on percentage instead of amount.

BLEEDING.DESCRIPTION: Deal (stack amount / 2) damage every turn, enemy receive 1% more attack damage and poison damage for each stack.

FATIGUE.DESCRIPTION: Fatigue is an unplayable status card. At the end of the turn, doesn't discard and makes you draw 1 less card next turn.
